description:
To protect the future of the GGG from the Lost Gear-fused Proto, Mona has created a giant Gunbar! Piloted by G-Wrench, Gunbar fights the Lost Gear. It`s giant robot versus giant robot... the biggest battle ever is about to unfold, with the fate of the GGG on the line!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スクラップ・アンド・ビルド
